summary: While invading Earth, Kahm runs across Tetsuya, a primitive but cute human and decides to marry him.
cast: Trish Ledoux|Kenji Utsumi|Tom Fahn|Mimi Woods|Kevin Seymour|Dorothy Elias-Fahn|Gary Dubin|Steve Blum|Steve Cassling|Gloria Gines|Steve Bulen|Doug Stone|Earl Moore|Sean Schemmel|Mitsuo Iwata|Liza Jacqueline|Fumi Hirano|Rebecca Soler|Mari Yokô|Erica Schroeder|Mika Doi|Oliver Wyman|Akira Kamiya|Mikio Terashima|Dan Green|Takashi Toyama|Tom Wayland|Dave Brenneman|Emi Shinohara|Ikuya Sawaki|Ken Yamaguchi|Hideyuki Umezu|Naoto Sato|Jôji Manabe|Yusaku Saotome|Katsuhisa Yamaguchi|Yûko Sakurai
title: Outlanders
